action.connect-keeping-first-only: connect, keeping text of first only
action.edit-next-entry-with-this-style: start editing next entry with this style
action.label: label
action.move-whole-end-time-to-cursor: move selection's end to cursor (as a whole)
action.move-whole-start-time-to-cursor: move selection's start to cursor (as a whole)
action.set-end-time-to-cursor: set end of active entry to cursor
action.set-start-time-to-cursor: set start of active entry to cursor

assimport.info-ignored: {n,plural,one{This warning means} other{These warnings mean}} the ASS file uses features that we don't yet support. If the "preserve override tags" option is checked, subtle will retain inline commands in subtitle entries even if it cannot display them correctly. If you are sure these commands are not necessary (e.g. only decorative), you can uncheck the option to skip them. Note that currently, embedded fonts and event fields are always not imported.
assimport.info-invalid: {n,plural,one{This warning means} other{These warnings mean}} the ASS file has some invalid parts, but otherwise can be successfully parsed. The invalid parts will be skipped.
assimport.info-override-tag: "Override tags" such as {\b1} temporarily change the format of ASS subtitle entries. subtle does not yet support this. If the "preserve override tags" option is enabled, they will be retained even though subtle cannot display them correctly. If you are sure they are not necessary, disable the option to delete them.

bugdialog.p1: In case of bugs, contact WeChat or Douban emfrosztovis, or email emfrosztovis@gmail.com. We have a WeChat group for beta-testing. Provide the application log if possible, but note that it may contain personal information such as file paths.
bugdialog.p2: If you are familiar with the development process, you can submit an issue directly to the GitHub repository. However, try to make sure that the same problem has not already been reported before.

c.column-view: change column view of subtitle table
c.drag-to-move-resize: drag entry to move or resize
c.label: edit label

combinedialog.explanation: Only entries with different styles can be combined. “Problematic entries” refer to ones that fit in the “label as” thresholds but not in the combine thresholds, and ones that can't be combined only because of having same styles.
combinedialog.have-been-combined-in: {n,plural,one{entries has} other{entry have}} been combined in

config.arrow-navigation-type-d: The preferred position of the newly selected entry when navigating the subtitle table with Up/Down arrow keys.
config.arrow-skip-amount-d: Amount of time to skip by pressing the left or right arrow button when a media file is loaded, in seconds.
config.auto-scroll-exponent-d: Exponent for the automatic scrolling when dragging outside of the table area. The magnitude of autoscroll speed per second is calculated as: (distanceFromEdge * factor) ^ exponent.
config.auto-scroll-factor-d: Multiplier for the automatic scrolling when dragging outside of the table area.
config.autosave-interval-d: Interval for autosaving the current file, in minutes. Set to 0 to disable autosave.
config.debug-d: ⚠️ Advanced options for debug purpose only. You shouldn't change them unless you know what you're doing.
config.each-style-of-selection: endpoints of each styles in the selection
config.enter-navigation-type-d: The preferred position of the newly selected entry when moving to it by pressing Enter in the input boxes.
config.keep-autosave-for-d: Autosave files older than this many days will be deleted. Set to zero to disable automatic deleting of autosave files.
config.limit-frame-size-d: Limit the size of data packets transmitted between the decoder and the frontend by using lower resolutions when necessary. In megabytes; values less than 0.5 are treated as no limit.
config.maximum-zoom-d: Maximum zoom level, in proportion to regular size (e.g. 1 = 100%, 2 = 200%).
config.minimum-scroller-length-d: Minimum scroller length to prevent it from becoming too small, in CSS pixels.
config.mouse-scroll-sensitivity-d: Multiplier for scrolling speed using mouse wheel. Adjust to make scrolling speed desirable and consistent with trackpad.
config.mouse-zoom-sensitivity-d: Multiplier for zooming speed using mouse wheel while holding Control. Adjust to make zooming speed desirable and consistent with trackpad.
config.navigation-keep-position: keep entry at the same screen position
config.preload-amount-d: Amount of preloading for video and audio playback, in seconds. A high value can lead to high memory consumption.
config.resize-area-size-d: Size of the area around the left and right side of an entry in which you can drag to resize the entry, in CSS pixels.
config.show-bounding-boxes-d: The bounding boxes are just a visual aid and are not visible on exported formats such as ASS.
config.show-keyframes-d: Color keyframes in the timeline. In many media files, keyframes can correspond to scene changes and are useful for aligning subtitles.
config.snap-distance-d: Maximum distance between entries for snapping, in CSS pixels.
config.snapping-d: Whether to enable snapping by default. If true, holding down Alt/Option temporarily disables it; if false, temporarily enables it.
config.trackpad-scroll-sensitivity-d: Multiplier for scrolling speed using trackpad (typically two-finger swiping). Adjust to make scrolling speed desirable and consistent with mouse wheel.
config.trackpad-zoom-sensitivity-d: Multiplier for zooming speed using trackpad (typically pinching). Adjust to make zooming speed desirable and consistent with mouse wheel.
config.twinkle-status-bar-d: Twinkle the status bar when new messages are being displayed.
config.ui-font-family-d: Specify fallbacks with a comma-separated list, as in CSS. Font names containing spaces should be wrapped in straight quotes ("").
config.use-hardware-acceleration-d: Tell FFmpeg to use hardware acceleration (D3D11VA on Windows, videotoolbox on macOS) for decoding when possible. In most cases this does NOT provide a visible speedup and you don't need to enable it.
config.waveform-resolution-d: The number of sample point per second for the waveform display. Larger value results in slower loading.

editbox.at-virtual-entry: double-click or press enter to append new entry
editbox.label: Label
editbox.no-selection: select a line to start editing

encodingdialog.conclusion: Choose an encoding, check the preview for correctness, then click 'ok' to convert the file to UTF-8 for use in modern applications.
encodingdialog.header: The file you're opening seems to be using an unusual encoding format.
encodingdialog.info: These formats can cause problems on today's devices. In order to open the file, we can try to convert it to the modern encoding. The estimation of formats is usually very accurate, unless the file is simply invalid; but when in doubt, consult an expert.

importdialog.import-all-even-if-identical-to-existing: import all (even if identical to existing style)
importdialog.import-only-styles-and-no-subtitles: import only styles and no subtitles
importdialog.overwrite-local-styles-when-names-match: overwrite local styles when names match
importdialog.sorted-after-existing-lines-if-time-poin: sorted; after existing lines if time points are equal
importdialog.sorted-before-existing-lines-if-time-poi: sorted; before existing lines if time points are equal
importdialog.use-local-styles-when-names-match: use local styles when names match

metrics.label: label
metrics.readable-characters-d: One single letter or single CJK glyph counts as one "readable character". Other characters like whitespaces and punctuations are not counted.
metrics.width-d: Each double-width character counts as two, while single-width count as one. Useful when working for traditional monospace displays.

msg.color-out-of-srgb-gamut: The sRGB color space cannot display this color accurately. Your monitor might be using the nearest representable color instead.
msg.errorbanner: An internal error has occurred. If possible, please report it to the developers with a log file attached.
msg.experimental: This is an experimental feature. Some things may not work.
msg.failed-to-parse-clipboard-data-as-subtit: failed to parse clipboard data as subtitles
msg.note-file-is-from-newer-version-path: Note: this file is from a newer version of subtle. We recommend you update this app. If you continue, all newer features present in the file will be lost upon saving.
msg.note-file-is-migrated-path: Note: this file is from an older version and will be updated. Small changes in styles may occur. After you save the updated file, older versions of this software will probably be unable to open it.
msg.overwrite-preset-with-same-name: Are you sure to overwrite the existing preset with this name?
msg.seeked-to-frame: Seeked to {time} ({pos}) after skipping {naudio} audio frames and {nvideo} video frames
msg.untimed-first-line-very-long: You have enabled "Consume first line of untimed text to fill newly drawn entries", but the first line is very long, probably indicating a mistake. Do you want to proceed?
msg.very-large-file-warning:
The file you're opening is very large and likely not a supported subtitle file.
Do you really want to proceed?
This may crash the application.
msg.you-cant-delete-a-default-style: You can't delete a default style. If you want to delete it, make something other default first.

ppty.scaling-d: Because font sizes and coordinates are relative to the resolution – the property value, unrelated to the actual media resolution – you may need to adjust the scaling factor when adapting a style or a subtitle file to a different resolution.
ppty.title: title

refsourcedialog.are-you-sure-to-delete-n-sources: Are you sure to delete {n} reference source{n,plural,one{} other{s}}?
refsourcedialog.confirm-reset: Are you sure to reset all reference sources?
refsourcedialog.css-patches-d: A set of CSS selectors, each with style directives overriding those of the original webpage
refsourcedialog.display-options-d: Should be valid CSS selectors when enabled.
refsourcedialog.name: name
refsourcedialog.url-d: Anchors (e.g. #English) are not supported. To automatically navigate to a specified element, enable "Use auto-scroll"

search.escape-sequence-help:
Available escape sequences:
\n	= newline
\t	= tab
\v	= vertical tab
\\	= the character '\'
$&	= the matched content
$`	= content before the match
$'	= content after the match
$$	= the character '$'
When using regular expressions:
$N	= the N-th capture group
search.regex-help: Regular expressions use a specialized, versatile notation to express search patterns. You can learn more about it in various online sources.

splitbylinedialog.error: 'Split by line' works only on entries with a single channel, but the selection you provided has multiple channels. You probably didn't want to do this.
splitbylinedialog.explanation-0: This tool converts subtitles, such as bilingual SRTs, where language switching is indicated by line breaks instead of style changes, into the correct format. Ensure that each line corresponds to a fixed language or format; for example, a language should not appear sometimes as two lines and sometimes as one line. Then you can select a unique style for each line. If there are too many things mixed up, consider pre-process the file using regular expressions. If there are only a few exceptions, you can use "Mark by line number" to label these abnormal entries for proofreading. After splitting, go to the properties page to check the style order and adjust the position to prevent misalignment.

srtimport.coordinates-info: subtle does not yet support individual positioning of entries. Such data will not be imported.
srtimport.info: Some players support HTML format tags in SRT subtitles. This is nonstandard. If the "preserve format tags" option is enabled, such tags will be retained, although subtle cannot display them correctly.

fill-in.already-has-style-msg: 你选择的区域有{0}个条目已经包含样式{1}，确认继续？

fuzzy.help: Matches currently selected subtitle text with phrases in the untimed text using a fuzzy algorithm. To view usage, open the keybinding editor.
fuzzy.search-failed-to-find-anything: fuzzy search failed to find anything
